select v.id,v.user_name,v.email,v.mobile,v.telphone,v.user_type,v.real_name,v.age,v.birthday,v.gender, v.nick_name,v.avatar,v.is_com,v.is_admin,v.create_time, a.user_name as create_user_name,v.update_time,b.user_name as update_user_name from sys_user v left join sys_user a on v.create_user = a.id left join sys_user b on v.update_user = b.id where 1=1 and v.status!='3' and v.is_admin = '1'
and (v.user_name like '%${name}%' or v.nick_name like'%${name}%' or v.real_name like '%${name}%')
order by update_time desc,create_time desc
select count(1) from sys_user where user_name = #{userName}

select v.id,v.user_name,v.email,v.mobile,v.telphone,v.user_type,v.real_name,v.age,v.birthday,v.gender, v.nick_name,v.avatar,v.is_com,v.is_admin from sys_group_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user v on a.user_id = v.id where a.group_id = #{groupId} and v.status!='3' and v.is_admin = '1'
and (v.user_name like '%${name}%' or v.nick_name like'%${name}%' or v.real_name like '%${name}%')
order by v.update_time desc,v.create_time desc
